title: Critical Fix for League in 4K

embed.description: Enjoy watching the video, please like and subscribe if you want! :) For any questions about me or the video you can just comment below. (Do u open descriptions?) (ง'̀-'́)ง ...

body:
TLDR: small cursor makes 4K league difficult to play. Seems like an easy fix.

League in 4k looks amazing, but there is one problem that makes it almost unplayable... The size of the cursor. All of the character models and the map looks great. Although some of the hud icons don't get scaled to 4K, that's not an issue. In the last patch, the health bar update introduced proper scaling in 4k too. The only problem is that the cursor stays the same resolution, meaning that it's 1/4 the scale on 4k. This becomes a huge problem in teamfights, especially over certain champions. 
Check out the linked video for what I mean. (watch for 10 seconds in full screen and to spot the cursor) Keep in mind, when you're playing, you have to look around as well, so you need to be able to find the cursor at a glance.

it would be really awesome if riot could fix this. Even simply scaling up the current cursor icon would be a great fix that I'd imagine takes a lot less work.
I'm kinda new to the forums here. Is there a way to bring this to riot's attention?
